Kodi wabwino ndi uti, yemwe adzaponyedwa ku Moto, kapena yemwe adzadza pa tsiku la chiweruziro uku ali wokhazikika mtima? Chitani zimene mukufuna; ndithu Iye Ngopenya chilichonse chimene mukuchita. (Aliyense adzamulipira pa zochita zake)
